snippet.title: Lost Lands 7: Redemption [Official Trailer]
snippet.description:
Meet the seventh game of the Lost Lands saga! 

Susan has been quite busy trying to maintain order in the Lost Lands. But a dangerous relic has been discovered on the Earth, so she must return to her homeland.

However, as a result of the time difference between the two worlds, Susan has been away for much longer than she thought. Unfortunately, it didn't go unnoticed. Her son Jim is angry with his mother because of her sudden disappearance and absence for years.

Susan wants to solve the issue as fast as possible to restore the world order, but her simple plan is fated to fail. Now Jim is involved in his mother's adventures against his own will.

Will Jim forgive his mother and accept her for who she is?
 
Will Susan put her family above saving the world and life full of endless adventures?
 
Will mother and son establish relations of trust and cooperation while in the center of a disaster?

It's time to explore every corner of the Lost Lands! Find hiding spots and collect manuscripts full of ancient knowledge. Use your mind to solve the mysteries of the magic temple and defeat the vengeful ancient deity.

Dive deep into new and dangerous adventures with old and loyal friends!

To play the game, follow the link below:
https://www.bigfishgames.com/games/18443/lost-lands-redemption-collectors-edition/?pc
